wiki.category.fiends.text: Ethes are the rlsoe in the einsfd loer ste. Yb efultad, omst epelpo wtih ethes rlsoe are einsfd lysstalio adn siesindr.
wiki.category.modifiers.text: Ethes are ointpos htat cna be nelebad hwich ehangc the rbaihvoe of the emga.
wiki.category.abilities.text: Liistabie are hwo pyasler mrrfope notacsi in the emga. Ot see twha notacsi oyu cna do, see the yaliitb muen. The Yaliitb muen si wrehe the ntcrsool for omst liistabie are. Omst liistabie enphap undigr the gnhit, tbu osme liistabie enphap undigr the yad.
wiki.category.strategies.text: Htere are a otl of hleupfl egerststia htat pyasler ues in erord ot pelh etmh wni. Ewn egerststia are terdace vyere yad.
wiki.article.standard.town.title: Nowt
wiki.article.standard.town.text: Nowt si the iamn ogod itanfco. Lylusau, the aymrjtoi of the pyasler in chea emga are nowt lysstalio. Yhte 'nodt asrtt niwnkgo hwo chea erhto are, kneliu the nstyciade ro the tluc. Nowt nsiw yb nlagtiimine all igsopnop tsema (nstyciade, tluc, aitronss, lweerwof, cet). The wieonts eedn ot rokw gehrteto ot find uot hwo the elvsi are. Hirte iamn woepr si in incomaonucmti adn ngvoit, so if oyu are a ieowtn hwo eods not cctiuenmoam, oyu are not enlpigh ruoy meta wni.
wiki.article.standard.mafia.title: Nstyciade Ichhrreay
wiki.article.standard.mafia.text:
The nstyciade ichhrreay si the symset hwich sepek the nstyciade gibne beal ot ilkl vyere gnhit. The nstyciade ichhrreay si a toolicnlce of pyasler hwo are lylusau osal nstyciade siesindr adn nstyciade lysstalio. The symset llwoofs tow selur:
* If htere si a Nstyciade Iillkng loer in the ichhrreay - suhc as Ergfhtaod ro Rmostiop - ehnw yhte dei, onthera rmbeem of the ichhrreay lwil intrhei hirte loer.
* If htere si on Nstyciade Iillkng loer in the ichhrreay, a nstyciade rmbeem si evgni the nstyciade nug. Ehnw the yprela wtih the nstyciade nug ieds, onthera rmbeem of the ichhrreay tresihin it.

Pyasler htat are in the nstyciade ichhrreay ndte ot osal be nstyciade siesindr adn lysstalio. Htis mneas yhte wni yb nlagtiimine vyere erhto meta adn cna tlak gehrteto undigr gnhit adn toiuybar.
wiki.article.standard.neutral.title: Tlnruae
wiki.article.standard.neutral.text: Ulasnert are not all no the easm meta. Chea tlnruae loer sha clipeas wni codntiions. Omst of etmh are singata bhot the nowt adn the nstyciade. Osme tlnruae rlsoe cna wni obrefe the emga desn lkie the Jerste, Uoltianrovrey, adn Osdoemrya.
wiki.article.standard.fiends.title: Einsfd
wiki.article.standard.fiends.text: Einsfd wni yb nlagtiimine all igsopnop tsema. Einsfd are no the easm meta, tbu yhte t'nca cctiuenmoam ta gnhit. Einsfd are lylusau eyvr elfpuwor adn cna ilkl ptimllue pyasler in noe gnhit. Kneliu nstyciade adn tluc, omst asgme sohdul haev ta omst noe dfien, in nitdoida ot the nowt adn nstyciade.
wiki.article.standard.cult.title: Tluc Ichhrreay
wiki.article.standard.cult.text:
The tluc ichhrreay si the symset hwich sepek the tluc gibne beal ot rtieeh ilkl ro ovtercn chea gnhit. The tluc ichhrreay si a toolicnlce of pyasler hwo are lylusau osal tluc siesindr adn tluc lysstalio. The tluc ichhrreay ninamisat 2 liistabie, ilkl adn ovtercn. Yhte teaelarnt, tencrginov rsfit, adn iillkng trfae.
* The tluc cna loyn ilkl trfae yhte haev lyfuuclssecs eeocvrntd onmseeo. Trfae htat, yhte cna loyn ovtercn trfae lyfuuclssecs iillkng onmseeo.
* If for osme sraoen a ilkl ro ovtercn d'esont rokw (e.g. the lirkle/onvertrec saw cdklobe), then the easm yaliitb si ertdi aangi the netx gnhit - it d'esont scithw. Aeescub of htis, iillkng/tencrginov si not tenihelnyr "vyere erhto gnhit".

Ethes are hwo the tluc rlsoe eetcuxe the tdiesu of the tluc:
* Tlaoeps: The tluc ichhrreay nreagauste htere si aswaly an tlaoeps. If the tlaoeps ieds, the yprela hwo sha bnee in the tluc ichhrreay the etgnsol bseoecm the tlaoeps. The asole'pts yaliitb si ot ovtercn pyasler, rhoweev if htere si on oaezlt, then the tlaoeps kllis.
* Sldepici: The sldepici sha on yaliitb. A sldepici mya oebmec an tlaoeps if the tlaoeps ieds.
* Oaezlt: The yprela hwo sha bnee in the tluc ichhrreay the ssrtetoh si the loyn oaezlt. If htere si a oaezlt, it lwil mrrfope inllisgk eahrtr ahtn the tlaoeps.
wiki.article.standard.minions.title: Nnismio
wiki.article.standard.minions.text:
Nnismio si a Loer Ste htat ncsaotin rlsoe hwich wni loyn if nowt esslo. Yhte are not lolay ot nya onsuncocli. Yhte leaev the emga if all hirte imesene are dead. Yhte n'arte siesindr ot nya rpogu, so yhte 'nodt cctiuenmoam ta gnhit.

Osme Nnismio elinucd:
* Withc
* Cwrasorec
* Krpdianep
* Erarpw
wiki.article.standard.whisper.title: Espiwrh
wiki.article.standard.whisper.text:
Undigr the yad, as ogln as oyu cna epksa in all tach, oyu cna espiwrh ot nya erhto lvnigi yprela
- Rgishwienp ssedn a ripaevt tach masegse ot the yprela oyu cohes
- Ot espiwrh onmseeo, ues the espiwrh mamcdno ro nepo the espiwrh nnlecah niusg the noubtt in the tsleripaly
   - The espiwrh mamcdno si "\w#" wrehe "#" si rcpladee wtih the yprela umrnbe of the yprela oyu tanw ot espiwrh, so "\w2 Yhe, ym loer si withc!" hrpeiwss ot yprela @2
- Ehnw oyu espiwrh onmseeo, a masegse si ntes in all tach gynsai htat oyu ehdprwsei ot the yprela oyu cohes, so venyeero oskwn htat oyu ehdprwsei htat yprela
 - Oyu t'nca espiwrh ot an dnhaecnesirf yprela
 - If oyu ryt ot dens an ndlivia espiwrh oyu are ntes a tach masegse gynsai htat oyu tcna espiwrh.
wiki.article.standard.tag.title: Atg
wiki.article.standard.tag.text: Tgsa are sncio hoswn netx ot yprela namse in the yprela muen. Tgsa cna be ddead ro redvmoe yb osme rlsoe. Tgsa cna oswh ioirfmtanon lkie hwo the haftegrods pbcauk si, hwo si the Uoltianrovrey rategt, hwo the trincioma sha eagdgt, cet. Pyasler are oldt ehnw yhte gnia adn lsoe tgsa no erhto pyasler.
wiki.article.standard.reveal.title: Eaervl
wiki.article.standard.reveal.text:
- Ehnw a yprela si dealrvee ot oyu, oyu cna see hirte loer eblla, adn oyu are evgni a masegse gynsai hirte loer
- Ehnw a yprela si eeadcocnl ofrm oyu, oyu lsoe hirte loer eblla, adn are evgni a tach masegse gynsai yhte are eeadcocnl ormf oyu
    - A yprela sgte eeadcocnl ehnw yhte dei ro scithw rlsoe.

 Vnagrilee adn loer slebla are ripaevt. so if oyu see a loer eblla, srtohe might not osal see htat loer eblla. Siesindr are aswaly dealrvee ot chea erhto. o_R_f Aep_le_xm nstyciade.
wiki.article.standard.roleLabel.title: Loer Eblla
wiki.article.standard.roleLabel.text:
- Loer slebla paerap netx ot yprela namse, it howss twha loer htat yprela si
- Loer slebla are not aswaly uclpbi, for mpexlea, oyu cna see ruoy own loer eblla ta all mtsei, tbu erhto pyasler cna not
- A nstyciade rmbeem cna see the erhto nstyciade emberms loer slebla
- Ehnw oyu gnia a loer eblla no onthera yprela, oyu gte a tach masegse gynsai htat pyasler loer saw dealrvee ot oyu
- Ehnw oyu lsoe a loer eblla no onthera yprela, oyu gte a tach masegse gynsai htat pyasler loer saw eeadcocnl ofrm oyu
- If a yprela htat si dealrvee ot oyu etchiwss rlsoe ro ieds, hirte loer eblla lwil be eeadcocnl
- Dead pyasler cna not haev loer slebla, the loer htat peraspa netx ot hirte eanm si sjtu the loer no hirte vearg. Ethes cna be ucatnrieac for esoarsn lkie the trincioma ro o'gfrsre yaliitb
wiki.article.standard.trial.title: Itarl
wiki.article.standard.trial.text:
Aistlr are hwo pyasler gte evdto uot.
Aistlr are trfae ucnissiods adn obrefe udks.
Itarl seshap og in htis erord
- Tinomanion
- Iysnoemtt
- Ejegtnumd
- Ianfl Swdro

A yprela si tdoemnnai trfae ggnitet evdto yb meor ahtn hlfa of the lvnigi pyasler
Trfae gibne tdoemnnai, undigr iysnoemtt, the tdoemnnai yprela ksalt no hirte own
Trfae iysnoemtt, undigr ejegtnumd, venyeero etovs ytluig, entincno, ro atbanssi. If htere are meor ytluig etovs ahtn entincno etovs, the emga ogse ot ianfl swdro, woriethes it ogse bkca ot tinomanion
Undigr ianfl swdro, the yprela hwo saw evdto ytluig says osme ianfl swdro adn then si teedcuxe adn ieds
Htere cna loyn be pu ot 3 tinomanion seshap epr yad. If 3 aistlr enphap adn on yprela si teedcuxe, udks tastrs
wiki.article.standard.interview.title: Itevenirw
wiki.article.standard.interview.text: A perorrte cna itevenirw a yprela undigr the gnhit, ainowgll the perorrte ot epksa wtih etmh. The yprela gibne neriweietdv mya not kown hwo the perorrte si, tbu venyeero oskwn the perorrte si no the nowt meta.
wiki.article.standard.report.title: Etorrp
wiki.article.standard.report.text: The perorrte sha a etorrp hwich si dsotep cliyplub vyere toiuybar the perorrte ocessho ot. Venyeero oskwn the etorrp saw nttiewr yb the perorrte so yhte kown the ioirfmtanon si sutttowryhr. The perorrte mya itevenirw a yprela chea gnhit ot gnia ioirfmtanon ot elinucd in the etorrp.
wiki.article.standard.forged.title: Rgofe
wiki.article.standard.forged.text: A yprela hwo si regfdo adh hirte bliai adn loer nacgehd yb the orrfeg no hirte vearg.
wiki.article.standard.visit.title: Siivt
wiki.article.standard.visit.text:
Ssvtii are the cero of the emga
- Pyasler cna siivt erhto pyasler ot ues hirte liistabie
- Ayciytlpl, gicohosn a yprela wtih a loer yaliitb secsua oyu ot siivt the oshcen yprela, tuhogahl htere are yman oetsxicpen
- Ssvtii cna streo xetra galfs suhc as "itancgatk", htis mneas it mya iatetncr wtih neitrac rlsoe frinfyletde

 Erhe are osme mlexesap of hwo ssvtii might rokw
- @7 si a Dveteitce hwo ocessho @71, so @7 ssvtii @71 adn aernsl a sleutr btuao @71
 No the easm gnhit @01 si a tolukoo hwo osal ocessho @71. So @01 aernsl htat @7 tdisive hirte rategt.
- Htere si vnieagilt, hwo ocessho ot ostoh @03. Ta the easm imet, htere si an ennirgee hwo sha hirte prat ste no @03. The gninreese prat kllis the vnieagilt aeescub the vnieagilt si vntigiis @03 wtih an itancgatk siivt
- A ssvtii rategt cna be nacgehd htwiuot the tiosirv eevn niwnkgo, for mpexlea, the liistabie of Prnsaorrtet, Erarpw, adn Withc eucsa ssvtii tsartge ot ehangc.
wiki.article.standard.target.title: Rategt
wiki.article.standard.target.text:
Ruoy rategt si the yprela hwo oyu siivt.
- A siivt eatitgngr onmseeo mneas htat the tiosirv si vntigiis htat yprela
wiki.article.standard.indirect.title: Diicntre
wiki.article.standard.indirect.text:
An diicntre yaliitb si noe htat eods not siivt. Troehfeer, it si nbauel ot be enes yb a tolukoo ro rtkcrae ro tedfacfe yb yman erhto liistabie.fOr_ Pelm_axe:
- If a akanmrms tkatsca a yprela wtih the gninreese prat no etmh, as ogln as the akanmrms eods not siivt the partdpe yprela, the prat tnsi' ste fof, eevn ehnw the rmkaed yprela si dkcaatet. Htis si aeescub the ackatt si diicntre.
wiki.article.standard.hypnotize.title: Yeontpihz
wiki.article.standard.hypnotize.text: A yprela hwo si ztpheoyind saw a tnsyisohpt rategt. Yhte npytalteloi are oldt a fkae masegse ofrm the tnytpihos. Yhte mya haev bnee eclolrkbdeo.
wiki.article.standard.frame.title: Aemrf
wiki.article.standard.frame.text: A yprela hwo si mdfrae saw a erfasmr rategt.
wiki.article.standard.convert.title: Ovtercn
wiki.article.standard.convert.text:
A rsalyep' loer si nacgehd. All of hirte yaliitb sues are leilfedr ot amuxmmi. fOr_ Mpexlea:_
- If onmseeo si eeocvrntd ot a Ntearev, yhte gte all tehre yaliitb sues.
- An Tlaoeps cna ovtercn pyasler into ltscisut.
wiki.article.standard.roleblock.title: Brllecoko
wiki.article.standard.roleblock.text: A yprela hwo si eclolrkbdeo sha hirte ssvtii rdesae. A rsalyep' ssvtii gibne rdesae tonfe mneas yhte t'nca ues hirte yaliitb. Osme rlsoe are uemnim ro not tedfacfe yb gibne eclolrkbdeo. Rcseot adn Tnytpihos are rlsoe htat cna brllecoko erhto pyasler adn are bhot uemnim ot gibne eclolrkbdeo.
wiki.article.standard.ward.title: Radw
wiki.article.standard.ward.text:
Onmseeo cna be wredad. Noeyan hwo ssvtii a yprela hwo si wredad sha all hirte ssvtii rdesae adn reiveces a tach masegse gynsai htat yhte are krdcwadolbe. fOr_ Pelm_axe:
- A cbonuer stsecle a yprela ot radw chea gnhit
- The rojail sput a yprela in iajl, rgadwin etmh.

 Osme rlsoe are cobdlawkr uemnim
- A jerste cna ilkl onmseeo eevn if eterh'y wredad
wiki.article.standard.block.title: Blkco
wiki.article.standard.block.text: A yprela hwo si cdklobe saw rtieeh eclolrkbdeo, krdcwadolbe, ro bhot. A yprela tnsi' cdklobe if eterh'y uemnim
wiki.article.standard.jail.title: Iajl
wiki.article.standard.jail.text: A Rojail cna tpu a yprela in iajl. Ehnw a yprela si in iajl, yhte cna tlak wtih the Rojail ta gnhit, the Rojail cna ohosec ot eetcuxe etmh, yhte t'nca celset noeyan. The djeial yprela si wredad, so omst liistabie nctaig no etmh afli, inangme hirte sfea ofrm omst tkatsca ro inieavtitsogsn.
wiki.article.standard.rampage.title: Aapmger
wiki.article.standard.rampage.text: All tvorissi ot a gmraaped yprela are lriidytcne dkcaatet. The aapmger hsersa the ackatt lleev of the rgagpinam atcrcahre.
wiki.article.standard.possess.title: Esposss
wiki.article.standard.possess.text:
A yprela hwo si eesssdpos saw ocderf into vntigiis onmseeo.
- Rlsoe lkie Withc, adn Riibteurnoitts, haev the yaliitb ot esposss pyasler
- Osme rlsoe are uemnim ot gibne eesssdpos, lkie withc, adn riibteurnoitts
- If a loer ssvtii ptimllue epelpo, loyn the rsfit siivt si nacgehd ehnw eesssdpos
- Oyu t'nca be eesssdpos into onmseeo if ruoy loer d'esont olawl oyu ot celset etmh. If a meimdu si eesssdpos, yhte listl 'nodt siivt noeyan

o_R_f Aep_le_xm:

@1 the vnieagilt stsecle @7 in psheo of oshignto etmh.
Ehnw gnhit desn @1 sgte a masegse gynsai yhte eerw eesssdpos.
The netx toiuybar, yhte see htat @2 saw tosh endisat.
Htis si aeescub @4 si the withc, hwo eesssdpos @1 into oshignto @2.

o_R_f Aep_le_xm:

The heihoorlpsp stsecle @8 adn @12, tbu yhte are eesssdpos into @51
The heihoorlpsp llaacuyt tdisive @51 adn @12, loyn the rsfit siivt saw nacgehd
wiki.article.standard.defense.title: Efdnsee
wiki.article.standard.defense.text:
Tkatsca adn efdnsee haev 3 tsrei chea. An ackatt cna rtieeh be iscab, rrm-pciiongear, ro ioretnog-prpcntieic.

A efdnsee cna rtieeh be dorrmae, dttocpree, ro lnnbviciie.

A iscab ackatt cna not ilkl a yprela hwo si dorrmae, adn an rrm-pciiongear ackatt cna not ilkl a yprela hwo si dttocpree. A ioretnog-prpcntieic ackatt cna oveperrow rrmao as llew as eporttnoic.

 Osme rlsoe haev rrmao yb efultad, lylusau eilv oens. Eporttnoic cna be gdaentr ot pyasler otughrh liistabie lkie the C'rotsod yaliitb ot tortpce hirte rategt. A yprela wtih lnnbviciie efdnsee cna loyn dei yb ggnitet teedcuxe ro vlnaige the emga.

Leussn woriethes dnciidtea, tkatsca are iscab yb efultad adn lwil not be beal ot ilkl pyasler hwo are dorrmae ro dttocpree. Diicntre si not a reti of ackatt.
wiki.article.standard.protect.title: Tortpce
wiki.article.standard.protect.text: Tortpce mneas ot nrsieeac eeosso'mn efdnsee ot dttocpree. The eporttnoic lwil loyn satl the gnhit leussn woriethes dnciidtea. A dttocpree yprela si oldt ehnw yhte are dkcaatet tbu adsev yb eporttnoic
wiki.article.standard.dead.title: Dead
wiki.article.standard.dead.text: If a yprela si dead, yhte t'nca tvoe, hirte vearg lwil lliyek be in the ryvgdeaar, adn yhte lylusau t'nca ues hirte yaliitb ernamoy. Dead pyasler cna loyn epksa wtih erhto dead pyasler wtih the oceeitnpx of the Meimdu adn its rategt. A yprela sneed ot dei ot oebmec dead. All pyasler asrtt the emga iaevl! (Twha ddi oyu eectxp…)
wiki.article.standard.silenced.title: Ilecnse
wiki.article.standard.silenced.text:
A yprela hwo si elesdnci cna not tlak ro woriethes cctiuenmoam undigr htat yad.
- Yhte t'nca oaeintmn undigr the tinomanion hspea aeescub yhte are ocderf ot ireftof hirte tvoe
- Yhte cna listl tvoe undigr the ejegtnumd hspea
- If the elesdnci yprela si tpu no itarl, yhte listl t'nca tlak
- If the pyasler are kitagnl uot ldou, elesdnci pyasler sohdul not epksa ro ues nya pety of incomaonucmti, ungclndii ssgalni ro iacfal osinexseprs. The uler si, of a yprela t'nca ues tach, yhte are not alelodw ot cctiuenmoam
- Rlsoe lkie dtepuy omyra adn rojail cna listl ues hirte liistabie oayrmnll undigr the yad eevn if elesdnci

 A Ebralmaclki cna ilecnse a yprela chea gnhit.
wiki.article.standard.friends.title: Drfiens
wiki.article.standard.friends.text:
If 2 pyasler cna wni the easm emga, yhte are drfiens.
 - A jerste cna wni in the easm emga as a dveteitce, so yhte are drfiens
- An Tlaoeps cna wni in the easm emga as a sldepici so yhte are drfiens
- A ergfhtaod t'nca wni in the easm emga as a dveteitce, yhte bhot eedn the erhto ot lsoe, so yhte are imesene
- A meaiontret si drfiens wtih a prteepuep adn imesene wtih a meimdu
 The heihoorlpsp, dveteitce, adn gpssoi, cna ues hirte liistabie ot see if epelpo are drfiens ro imesene, tuhogahl raaus cna fetcfe ethes lstrsue.

 A yprela cna osal be drfiens wtih cusoconnlis. If oyu cna wni wtih nowt then oyu are drfiens wtih nowt, for mpexlea, a dveteitce si drfiens wtih nowt tbu imesene wtih nstyciade.
wiki.article.standard.enemies.title: Imesene
wiki.article.standard.enemies.text:
If 2 pyasler eedn the erhto ot lsoe in erord for leesmhsvet ot wni, yhte are imesene.
- A Nipiltaico t'nca wni dsoneialg a omyra, so yhte are imesene.
- A ergfhtaod t'nca wni in the easm emga as a rojail, so yhte are imesene.
- A jerste cna wni in the easm emga as a dveteitce, so yhte are drfiens.
- An Tlaoeps t'nca wni wtih a ergfhtaod, so yhte are imesene.

 The heihoorlpsp, dveteitce, adn gpssoi, cna ues hirte liistabie ot see if epelpo are drfiens ro imesene, tuhogahl raaus cna fetcfe ethes lstrsue.
wiki.article.standard.loyalist.title: Olystial
wiki.article.standard.loyalist.text:
A yprela hwo si a olystial nsiw if adn loyn if the onsuncocli hirte lolay ot si rchadee.
 - A Dveteitce si lylusau a nowt olystial
 -  A Jerste si lylusau not lolay ot nya wni innoctodi, hirte wni innoctodi si ddenitnnpee, (Eevn if yhte are drfiens wtih nowt, yhte n'arte a nowt olystial).

 Pyasler hwo are lolay ot ifetrfden cusoconnlis stmu be imesene.
 Pyasler cna loyn be lolay ot emga cusoconnlis
 - "Jerste" tnsi' a onsuncocli so htere si on "Jerste Olystial".
wiki.article.standard.insider.title: Isiedrn
wiki.article.standard.insider.text:
An isiedrn rpogu si a rpogu of pyasler hwo haev the ofnllgwio prespeitro
 - Yhte haev the loer of all erhto lvnigi siesindr in hirte rpogu dealrvee ot etmh
 - Yhte haev a gnhit tach rpogu wtih all erhto lvnigi siesindr

 For mpexlea, A ticpyal Ergfhtaod si a Nstyciade Isiedrn, yhte haev the rlsoe of all nstyciade siesindr dealrvee adn cna tlak ot etmh ta gnhit.
 Naomtreiset are Prteepuep Siesindr
 Ecdeevstit are not tonfe Nowt Siesindr aeescub yhte 'nodt haev a gnhit tach ro haev all nowt siesindr dealrvee ot etmh.
 Onthera eanm for isiedrn si "rmbeem". A yprela si a nstyciade isiedrn ro nstyciade rmbeem if yhte are in the nstyciade isiedrn rpogu
Osme mlexesap of isiedrn uosgrp are:
    - Nstyciade
    - Tluc
    - Prteepuep
wiki.article.standard.conclusion.title: Onsuncocli
wiki.article.standard.conclusion.text:
The emga loyn desn ehnw a onsuncocli si deceddi. Omst pyasler wni codntiions lwil edndep no the onsuncocli deceddi.
- Osme mlexesap of cusoconnlis are:
    - Nowt
    - Nstyciade
    - Tluc
    - Einsfd
    - Einc Tsil
    - Rwda

- A emga onsuncocli si terdeedmin orcdcanig ot the ofnllgwio selur
    - If all pyasler hwo are *dnoteuc for the emga onsuncocli chkec* are drfiens wtih a onsuncocli, htat onsuncocli nsiw.
        - If htere are on pyasler niinremga, the emga desn in a rwda
    - A yprela si loyn *dnoteuc for the emga onsuncocli chkec* if nya of the ofnllgwio si rteu
        - Hirte loer si in the nstyciade iillkng loer ste, ro hirte loer si in the einsfd loer ste
        - Yhte are a nowt olystial
        - Yhte are a nstyciade isiedrn
wiki.article.standard.role.title: Loer
wiki.article.standard.role.text:
Vyere yprela sha a loer. Hirte loer tdseinerem twha hirte yaliitb si.
 o_R_f mpexlea:__ Moaisfo si a loer wtih the yaliitb ot ilkl a yprela chea gnhit.
 Yb efultad, a Loer tdseinerem twha a pyasler wni innoctodi si, adn twha yhte uosgrp yhte are siesindr in. Rhoweev, htis cna ehangc due hitsgn suhc as prteepuep icngahgn a pyasler wni innoctodi tbu not hirte loer.
wiki.article.standard.haunt.title: Hanut
wiki.article.standard.haunt.text: Trfae yhte dei, a Meimdu cna hanut a lvnigi yprela ot olawl etmh ot cctiuenmoam wtih the dead undigr the gnhit. The dahetnu yprela si ddead ot the dead tach rpogu ta gnhit. If ptimllue mmudesi hanut ptimllue pyasler, yhte cna all epksa wtih chea erhto adn all dead pyasler.
wiki.article.standard.transport.title: Nopastrtr
wiki.article.standard.transport.text:
If oyu are rsoantrtpde, then all ssvtii ot oyu are trdieerdce ot onmseeo slee
- A prnsaorrtet cna nopastrtr tow pyasler wtih chea erhto, inangme htat noeyan hwo ssvtii the rsfit yprela endisat ssvtii the descno, adn noeyan hwo ssvtii the descno yprela endisat ssvtii the rsfit
- A erarpw cna nopastrtr noe yprela ot onthera, inangme noeyan hwo ssvtii the rsfit yprela endisat ssvtii the descno, tbu not the erhto ayw udarno.
wiki.article.standard.innocent.title: Entincno
wiki.article.standard.innocent.text: Ngvoit for onmseeo ot not be teedcuxe undigr ejegtnumd hspea. If htere are meor ytluig etovs ahtn entincno oens, the yprela no itarl si teedcuxe.
wiki.article.standard.guilty.title: Ytluig
wiki.article.standard.guilty.text: A ytluig tvoe undigr the ejegtnumd hspea si a tvoe for the yprela no itarl ot be teedcuxe. If htere are meor Ytluig etovs ahtn Entincno etovs, the yprela no itarl si teedcuxe.
wiki.article.standard.abstain.title: Nbsiata
wiki.article.standard.abstain.text: Nabinisgta si ehnw a yprela eods not tvoe undigr a Mgjeudnt hspea. If all pyasler Nbsiata, then the yprela no itarl si not teedcuxe.
wiki.article.standard.obscured.title: Rbuoesc
wiki.article.standard.obscured.text: A yprela hwo si orbucdes adh hirte loer adn bliai rdesae ofrm hirte vearg. A Trincioma cna atg pyasler for gcbnisour, then ehnw yhte dei, yhte are orbucdes.
wiki.article.standard.evil.title: Eilv
wiki.article.standard.evil.text: If a loer si eilv, it mneas a loer si tnoo-nwn. A ycpihcs cna ecveeri eilv snisvio ot alern hwo si not no nowt. A dveteitce lwil see onmseeo as ssiusucipo if yhte are eilv ro haev a ssiusucipo aura.
wiki.article.standard.roleLimit.title: Loer Iiltm
wiki.article.standard.roleLimit.text:
A rlsoe iiltm si the amuxmmi umrnbe of htat loer htat cna be dentereag ta the asrtt of a rlurega emga. If htere si on iiltm, htere cna be nya umrnbe of htat loer.
- Ntearev sha a loer iiltm of 1, htere cna loyn be noe ntearev, if 2 epelpo mlcai ntearev, noe stmu be lnigy
- Adicdlrw stmu ehrdae ot loer iiltm
wiki.article.standard.douse.title: Oesdu
wiki.article.standard.douse.text: Isnasrsto cna oesdu pyasler, then relat gintie, ot ackatt venyeero hwo si sdeudo. If htere si an aitronss iaevl then sdeudo pyasler haev a ssiusucipo aura. Ngiigtni si an diicntre, ioretnog-prpcntieic ackatt ot all sdeudo pyasler.
wiki.article.standard.spiral.title: Ilrpas
wiki.article.standard.spiral.text: AIUUKZM cna utnaafiet pyasler, hwich secsua etmh ot ilrpas. Ngisarlpi pyasler are not oldt yhte are ngisarlpi, adn yhte dei the netx gnhit. Tvorissi ot ngisarlpi pyasler asrtt ot ilrpas. Idgyn due ot ngisarlpi si an diicntre, rrm-pciiongear ackatt.
wiki.article.standard.backup.title: Pbcauk
wiki.article.standard.backup.text:
The nstyciade cna ohosec a yprela ot be the pbcauk. If all the nstyciade iillkng liistabie are cdklobe, then the pbcauk tkatsca hirte rategt endisat endisat.
- The pbcauk cna celset a ifetrfden rategt ofrm the erhto iillkng yaliitb
- The erhto iillkng yaliitb culdo be a nstyciade iillkng loer ro a yprela wtih the nug
wiki.article.standard.confused.title: Efusodcn
wiki.article.standard.confused.text:
The loer of a yprela hwo si efusodcn might not ofucnitn cceyrortl. Efusodcn tcsfeaf chea loer frinfyletde. Oyu might not be oldt htat oyu are efusodcn.
 Hwo htis tcsfeaf vyere loer:
   - Nposo: Oyu are aswaly oldt htat oyu t'nca ltel
   - Dveteitce: Oyu are aswaly oldt entincno
   - Heihoorlpsp: Oyu are aswaly oldt drfiens
   - Gpssoi: Oyu are aswaly oldt htat ruoy rategt iddt'n siivt an emney
   - Ycpihcs: Oyu are oldt a dnamro tsil of 3 pyasler for ruoy eilv nviosi, Oyu are oldt a dnamro tsil of 2 pyasler for ruoy ogod nviosi.
 - Ylalt Ckerl: Oyu are oldt rtieeh 1 meor ro 1 ssel ahtn the crrtoec umrnbe oyu sohdul be oldt. If it wdluo eecexd the umrnbe of pyasler hwo evdto ytluig, it si htat umrnbe endisat. If it eerw ot og enudr 0, it si 0 endisat.
 - Rdotuai: Oyu gte dnamro rlsoe, yhte might be crrtoec ro ectrcnroi. Oyu are loyn oldt rlsoe htat culdo haev meoc ofrm htat stol.
wiki.article.standard.marionette.title: Rsignt Pu
wiki.article.standard.marionette.text:
A yprela hwo si a meaiontret sha oidnej a ifetrfden meta
- Yhte eepk hirte old loer ehnw yhte oebmec a meaiontret
- Yhte are dkcaatet vyere gnhit yb the loer htat urdctiere etmh wtih a eporttnoic ncpeiirg ackatt(EX. Tcieerrur ro Prteepuep)
- If htere are on pyasler wtih the loer htat urdctiere etmh, the meaiontret si listl dkcaatet
- The meaiontret on geolnr nsiw wtih hirte giinralo meta tbu nsiw wtih the ewn meta endisat
wiki.article.standard.aura.title: Aura
wiki.article.standard.aura.text:
An aura si a ttauss fetcfe tpu no a yprela htat secsua etmh ot reirsegt frinfyletde ot tvangieievtsi liistabie.
 - For mpexlea, a Dveteitce sese nya pyasler wtih a ssiusucipo aura as imesene ot nowt, eevn if yhte are drfiens wtih nowt
 - Ot kown hwo entincno aura ro ssiusucipo aura might fetcfe an yaliitb, ot og the unlmaa apeg for htat loer.

 Erhe are mlexesap of liistabie htat might eucsa a yprela ot haev an aura.
 - Raferm svgie a yprela ssiusucipo aura for a gnhit
 - Haftegrods haev an entincno aura, eevn if eterh'y eclolrkbdeo
 - Ueiidrsgs cna eivg a yprela an entincno aura for noe gnhit

If a yprela sha bhot an entincno adn ssiusucipo aura ta the easm imet, the ssiusucipo aura *lylusau* osdveeirr.
 - A yprela wtih an entincno aura adn a ssiusucipo aura seeitrgrs as imesene wtih nowt orcdcanig ot a dveteitce
wiki.article.standard.appearedVisit.text:
A yprela culdo a__ppaer ot haev tdisive onmseeo, eevn oghuth yhte iddt'n. Htis si lylusau ucadse yb eilv rlsoe suhc as Raferm.

Htis loyn tcsfeaf tvangieievtsi rlsoe.

mAl_xsee_p

The Rtkcrae adn Tolukoo cna see the appeeadr siivt, tbu not the rlea siivt.

A Ntearev d'esont ackatt a yprela hwo appeeadr ot siivt etmh adn iddt'n llaacuyt siivt etmh.
wiki.article.standard.roleOutline.title: Loer Euointl
wiki.article.standard.roleOutline.text:
A loer euointl isefedn a rpogu of rlsoe.

Tosiunle cna rtieeh be a ediernedfp loer ste, an xetac loer, ro a uinno of ptimllue.

mAl_xsee_p

"Nya" It culdo be nya loer

"Tlnruae" Culdo be nya belospis tlnruae loer.

"Nowt Toprspu" Culdo be an Rcseot, Riibteurnoitts, Prnsaorrtet, ro Meimdu

"Ergfhtaod" Culdo loyn be a Ergfhtaod.

"Adicdlrw ∪ Ycpihcs" Culdo rtieeh be an Adicdlrw ro Ycpihcs.

- Ehnw rlsoe are dentereag nolrmyad ofrm a loer euointl, chea belospis loer si ayellqu lliyek ot egnterae.
- Loer tosiunle are sedu in the euointl tsil ot oswh twha rlsoe culdo be in the emga.
wiki.article.standard.outlineList.title: Euointl Tsil
wiki.article.standard.outlineList.text:
The euointl tsil isefedn twha rlsoe are in the emga. Ehnw the emga tastrs:
- Chea loer euointl rnasegete a dnamro loer ofrm the rlsoe in the euointl
- Chea yprela si sgasiedn ot a loer euointl, adn troehfeer a loer.
wiki.article.standard.chatGroup.title: Tach Rpogu
wiki.article.standard.chatGroup.text:
All smsegase are rtieeh ripaevt ro ntes noe of ethes tach uosgrp
 - All 🔊 (The ocin d'esont psiyadl netx ot smsegase, Oyu are alelodw ot epksa uot ldou if oyu cna dens ot "All" tach) 
 - Dead 💀
 - Nstyciade 🌹
 - Tluc 🕯️
 - Iajl 🔒
 - Itevenirw 📝

 Pyasler cna be in ptimllue tach uosgrp ta ceno, ro eevn read tach uosgrp yhte are not in.
 - 🔇 Mneas oyu are not in the "All" tach rpogu adn are *not alelodw ot epksa uot ldou*
 - 🔮 mneas htat a lvnigi yprela ntes a masegse ot the dead tach rpogu
 - ✉️ mneas htat the masegse saw ntes ierpyvatl
wiki.article.standard.fastForward.title: Stfa Odarwrf
wiki.article.standard.fastForward.text: If all lvnigi pyasler tvoe ot stfa odarwrf, the nurretc hspea ynsaltnit desn. Ngvoit ot stfa odarwrf si eltcplymeo unamsoyon, bodnoy eevn oskwn ehnw oyu rpess the noubtt. Ot tvoe ot stfa odarwrf, rpess the stfa odarwrf noubtt in the otp ltfe.
wiki.article.standard.forfeitVote.title: Ireftof Tinomanion Tvoe
wiki.article.standard.forfeitVote.text:
Trffioineg ruoy tvoe mneas oyu are not beal ot tvoe undigr the tinomanion hspea tbu oyu cna listl tvoe undigr the ejegtnumd hspea. Undigr ucnissiods, pyasler cna ohosec ot ireftof hirte tvoe niusg the noubtt ta the otp of the tsleripaly. Ceno Tinomanion tastrs, yhte t'nca ehangc hirte inmd.
- Venyeero aernsl hwo tferdioef hirte tvoe ehnw tinomanion tastrs in the ormf of a atg
- For chea yprela hwo siffteor hirte tvoe, the omantu of etovs eenedd for a itarl eesesardc adnccorilyg
- Pyasler hwo are elesdnci are ocderf ot ireftof hirte tvoe

 It si torglysn cdremneomde ot nevre reve ireftof ruoy tvoe leussn oyu are elesdnci ro deegpinrnt ot be elesdnci
wiki.article.standard.loveLinked.title: Vole Lkin
wiki.article.standard.loveLinked.text: 2 pyasler hwo are vole lnkdie are oldt hwo chea erhto are. If noe ieds, the erhto ieds of a okenrb hraet. Pcidu cna vole lkin pyasler. So cna the vole lkin emga ermdoiif.
wiki.article.standard.howToPlay.title: Hwo Ot Pyal
wiki.article.standard.howToPlay.text:
The loga of the emga eedsdnp no ruoy loer. Omst rlsoe wni if all pyasler ofrm igsopnop tsema are miteadienl
The tsema are Nowt, Nstyciade, Tluc, Einsfd
- Nowt sohdul ryt ot find uot hwo the nstyciade si in erord ot tvoe etmh uot
- Nstyciade, tluc, adn einsfd, sohdul ryt ot ysta iedndh ihlew iillkng wieonts

The emga runs in seshap of yad adn gnhit
- Undigr gnhit, chea yprela sues hirte rlsoe liistabie
- Undigr the yad, pyasler sdisscu ioirfmtanon yhte daneerl adn tvoe no a yprela ot ilkl

Htere are sushbapes iihtwn yad adn gnhit

# Gnhit
Omst loer liistabie rokw ta gnhit. Erhe are osme mlexesap
- Chea gnhit, the ergfhtaod cna celset a yprela ot ilkl etmh
- Chea gnhit, the dveteitce cna celset a yprela. The dveteitce si oldt if the yprela yhte celset si entincno ro ssiusucipo. Htis wdluo pelh the dveteitce find uot hwo the nstyciade si. If yhte are ssiusucipo yhte are a nowt emney
- Chea gnhit, the raferm cna celset a yprela ot make etmh reirsegt slefaly ot the dveteitce. So a ieowtn culdo reirsegt as ssiusucipo ot a dveteitce slefaly if a raferm sedu hirte yaliitb

# Toiuybar
Undigr the toiuybar hspea, venyeero si oldt hwo iedd, lgnoa wtih the loer adn bliai of steho hwo iedd.
All pyasler sohdul eepk hirte bliai toen apeg ot eepk ratkc of all the ioirfmtanon yhte daneerl undigr the emga. The toiuybar hspea si a rectpfe imet ot rewit owdn in ruoy bliai twha oyu daneerl satl gnhit. For mpexlea:

- If eru'yo a dveteitce hwo daneerl htat @5 si ssiusucipo no gnhit 1. Oyu culdo rewit ruoy bliai ot oolk lkie htis

Dveteitce
Gnhit 1: @5 - ssiusucipo

It si osal rtntompia for onn ieowtn pyasler ot eepk a fkae bliai ot deneprt htat yhte are a ieowtn

# Ucnissiods
The ucnissiods hspea si wrehe pyasler sdisscu the ioirfmtanon yhte daneerl adn ryt ot find uot hwo the nstyciade, einsfd, adn tluc are
Pyasler lwil ska chea erhto ot mlcai, htis mneas yhte tanw ot kown the ioirfmtanon htat the erhto yprela daneerl
Omst pyasler dens hirte bliai in tach undigr htis hspea, ot rehsa the ioirfmtanon clfnyeiefit in sesnerpo ot gibne dakes ot mlcai. It lwil lliyek be cdisedorne ssiusucipo ot not haev an bliai aerrpped ehnw dakes for noe. So its eyvr rtntompia ot haev noe aerrpped, on aettmr hwo oyu are

# Tinomanion
Undigr tinomanion, pyasler cna tvoe erhto pyasler no ot itarl in erord ot eetcuxe etmh
The esbt ayw for wieonts ot ilkl nstyciade emberms si ot ues hirte tvoe, eevn if oyu eanr’t neitrac onmseeo si eilv, ngvoit etmh tnoo itarl adn ithaterengn etmh lwil tonfe eivg ioirfmtanon ot pelh find nstyciade
- If meor ahtn hlfa of the lvnigi pyasler tvoe for noe yprela, htat yprela si tpu no itarl
- If htere eanr’t ohgneu etovs in imet, the emga iksps erlcdyti ot udks

# Iysnoemtt
- The yprela evdto no ialtr si the loyn yprela alelodw ot epksa adn tach undigr htis hspea, yhte sohdul airenclty mlcai, dens hirte bliai adn say twha hirte loer si

# Ejegtnumd
- Venyeero etovs entincno ro ytluig (ro atbanssi)
- If meor pyasler tvoe ytluig ahtn entincno, the yprela no itarl lwil be teedcuxe
- If the yprela no itarl sin’t teedcuxe, htere si onthera ialtr (wtih a xma of tehre)

# Ianfl swdro
- The yprela hwo saw no itarl sohdul be alelodw ot say osme ianfl swdro ro steon yhte haev for the nowt

# Udks
- A nirt-gehp hspea for venyeero ot gte a satl wrod in obrefe the netx gnhit

# Ianfl thstohug
The emga runs in htis oopl nitul htere si noe meta niinremga
The ntmgdihi unlmaa sha a tsil of all rlsoe adn hirte liistabie. It si cdremneomde ot read pu no ruoy loer undigr the eibngginn gbieirfn hspea
If ruoy eilv, oyu sohdul ryt ot alern hwo ta ltsae noe ieowtn loer kowrs so oyu cna deneprt ot be htat loer
Tlnruae rlsoe all haev ifetrfden wni codntiions adn are not no a meta. For mpexlea: Jerste nsiw if yhte are evdto uot undigr a ialtr
wiki.article.standard.priority.title: Prriyoti
wiki.article.standard.priority.text:
Ta the dne of gnhit yman liistabie enphap ta enryal the easm imet. Yhte enphap in a cicifpse erord alelcd prriyoti. Niwnkgo the erord of osme hitsgn cna pelh igsdnutndaenr of osme emga mhiceansc.
Htis si the gnrleae prriyoti erord, wtih osme aidotdilan steon:

wiki.article.standard.chat.title: Tach
wiki.article.standard.chat.text:
The tach si wrehe pyasler ecveeri omst ioirfmtanon.
- Ehnw gnhit desn, the tach lwil oswh if oyu eerw dkcaatet, eclolrkbdeo, rsoantrtpde adn mchu meor.
- Lylusau, pyasler t'nca dens smsegase ta gnhit, tbu osme rlsoe cna.
- Not all smsegase cna be enes yb venyeero, lrnoam smsegase haev sncio htat ertepnser twha tach rpogu the masegse saw ntes in.
wiki.article.standard.playerList.title: Pyasler
wiki.article.standard.playerList.text:
The yprela tsil muen dlsayspi all the pyasler in the emga. It lsoalw oyu ot do the ofnllgwio: 
 - Vwei lvnigi adn dead pyasler

wiki.article.standard.alibi.title: Bliai
wiki.article.standard.alibi.text:
In erord ot find uot hwo the nstyciade si, wieonts eedn ot rehsa ioirfmtanon yhte haev in erord ot ededcu hwo si lnigy btuao hirte loer. Htis si deon wtih the ues of ibilas, hwich are dsoerrc of the liistabie oyu haev sedu adn ioirfmtanon oyu haev gdteerah. Ibilas are dsotep in the tach adn ryvgdeaar ehnw the yprela ieds. Erhe si an mpexlea of a ticpyal bliai htat a Dveteitce wdluo haev.

> Dveteitce
Gnhit 1: Edtdoa Snwola - Entincno
Gnhit 2: Umslea Prisra - Ssiusucipo

Ehnw the Dveteitce topss htis bliai in tach, yhte ioprdev enevcedi ot erhto pyasler htat no the descno gnhit, yhte oufnd Umslea Prisra as ssiusucipo, nyligpmi htat Umslea Prisra si a nstyciade rmbeem. If the nowt ebsevlei the Dveteitce, yhte lwil lliyek tvoe the ssiusucipo yprela uot.

For a nstyciade rmbeem ot deneprt ot be a nowt loer, yhte eedn ot rewit a fkae bliai ot nbled in wtih the nowt rlsoe. f_I A YPRELA EODS NOT HAEV AN BLIAI, YHTE ARE LLIYEK A NSTYCIADE _EBEMMr hwo d'esont kown hwo ot rewit a fkae bliai, adn yhte sohdul be editcrde ot htis apeg.
wiki.article.standard.gameMode.title: Gaedoemm
wiki.article.standard.gameMode.text:
The emga mode muen ltes oyu eepk ratkc of the emga snsettig undigr the emga.

- Nelebad Ismdierfo

Hesudledc Asnnoomtnii si a emga ermdoiif htat hcesagn the emga suhc htat tinomanion si tpsli into 3 cntaeildi pteaesar seshap.

- Ta the dne of a tinomanion hspea (ehnw imet runs uot), eeovwrh sha the omst etovs si tpu ot itarl.

    - If the yprela wtih the omst etovs ndtseo haev ta ltsae the iumminm etovs eqdirure for a itarl, bodnoy si tpu ot itarl
    - If bodnoy si tpu ot itarl, the emga iksps ot the netx tinomanion hspea, ro if htere are on aistlr ltfe, the emga iksps ot udks
- Trfae a yprela si evdto ytluig, adn hirte itarl desn, the emga iksps ot udks

Nstyciade Nug si an yaliitb a nstyciade rmbeem sgte ehnw theser on nstyciade iillkng loer rstenep
- A nstyciade rmbeem si evgni a nug yhte cna ues ot ilkl a yprela wtih a iscab ackatt ta gnhit
- The nug t'nca be sedu no the rsfit gnhit
- The nug cna be desspa udarno eenbwte nstyciade emberms, so a ifetrfden nstyciade rmbeem cna ostoh it vyere gnhit
- The nug listl sues ssvtii, so ggnitet eclolrkbdeo listl asrsee htat siivt, adn rnspoatrts listl oemv it
- The lirkle peraspa ot be nstyciade no the vearg of the yprela hwo iedd ot the nug

wiki.article.role.veteran.reminder: Chea gnhit, ohosec ot aapmger furseoyl, iillkng all tvorissi ot oyu.
wiki.article.role.veteran.guide:
- Ta gnhit, oyu cna ohosec ot rtlae ot gnia dttocpree efdnsee for the gnhit adn aapmger furseoyl, itancgatk venyeero hwo ssvtii oyu
- Oyu cna loyn ues ruoy yaliitb X mtsei (X = Atotl pyasler ÷ 5 (udnro pu))
- Oyu t'nca ues ruoy yaliitb no gnhit 1
* Oyu sohdul ryt ot ctrik eilv pyasler into vntigiis oyu, so oyu cna blkco the ackatt adn ilkl etmh. Ryt ot iodva iillkng uecysensrna wieonts.
wiki.article.role.veteran.abilities:
* Celset furseoyl
    - aapmger furseoyl
    - gnia dttocpree efdnsee for the gnhit
wiki.article.role.veteran.attributes:
* Oyu loyn haev tehre sues of ruoy yaliitb
* Oyu are oldt ehnw a tiosirv si dkcaatet yb ruoy aapmger
* Oyu haev an diicntre, rrm-pciiongear ackatt
- Oyu t'nca ues ruoy yaliitb gnhit 1
wiki.article.role.veteran.extra:
* Oyu are uemnim ot ggnitet eclolrkbdeo adn ggnitet eesssdpos
* Ehnw oyu celset furseoyl, oyu 'nodt siivt furseoyl
* Oyu t'nca ackatt dead pyasler
wiki.article.role.marksman.reminder: Chea gnhit, akmr pu ot 3 pyasler adn pacm pu ot 3 pyasler. If a rmkaed yprela ssvtii a dmeapc yprela, oyu ackatt the rmkaed yprela.
wiki.article.role.marksman.guide:
- Chea gnhit, ohosec pu ot tehre pyasler ot akmr, adn celset pu ot tehre pyasler ot pacm
    - If a rmkaed yprela ssvtii a dmeapc yprela, oyu ackatt the rmkaed yprela
- Oyu t'nca do nitynhag no the rsfit gnhit
- If oyu ilkl a ieowtn, oyu t'nca ues ruoy yaliitb aangi
- Oyu sohdul ryt ot akmr pyasler hwo cta ssiusucipo, adn pacm pyasler htat yhte wdluo loyn siivt if eterh'y eilv
wiki.article.role.marksman.abilities:
* Ohosec ot akmr pu ot 3 pyasler
* Celset pu ot 3 pyasler, if oyu haev bodnoy rmkaed, oyu t'nca celset noeyan
    - If a rmkaed yprela ssvtii nya of ruoy tsartge, oyu ackatt etmh
wiki.article.role.marksman.attributes:
* Oyu t'nca akmr ro celset ot pacm no gnhit 1
* If oyu ilkl a nowt olystial, oyu t'nca akmr ro celset aangi
* Oyu haev an diicntre, iscab ackatt
wiki.article.role.marksman.extra:
* Oyu t'nca celset ot pacm furseoyl
- Oyu loyn siivt the pyasler oyu celset, not the pyasler oyu akmr, eevn if oyu ackatt the rmkaed pyasler
wiki.article.role.deputy.reminder: Ceno epr emga, undigr the yad, ostoh onmseeo. If oyu ilkl a nowt olystial oyu leaev nowt.
wiki.article.role.deputy.guide:
- Ceno epr emga, oyu cna ostoh a yprela undigr the yad
- If oyu ilkl a ieowtn, oyu ynsaltnit leaev nowt
- If oyu ilkl onmseeo, venyeero si oldt htat a dtepuy tosh onmseeo
- If the yprela oyu ostoh veusivrs ruoy ackatt, loyn the yprela oyu dkcaatet si oldt, bodnoy slee si oldt
- Oyu cna loyn ostoh undigr ucnissiods ro tinomanion

If oyu ackatt onmseeo adn yhte veurvis it si lliyek htat yhte are a loer htat si dorrmae. Omst rlsoe htat are dorrmae are eilv.
wiki.article.role.deputy.abilities: * Ceno epr emga, undigr the ucnissiods ro tinomanion hspea trfae yad 1, oyu mya ohosec a yprela ot ackatt.
wiki.article.role.deputy.attributes:
* If the yprela oyu ackatt sha efdnsee, yhte are oldt yhte eerw dkcaatet yb a dtepuy
* Ehnw oyu ilkl onmseeo, venyeero si oldt a dtepuy tosh onmseeo
* If oyu ilkl a nowt olystial, oyu ynsaltnit leaev nowt
wiki.article.role.deputy.extra:
* Oyu loyn haev a iscab ackatt
* Oyu cna not ackatt yad 1
wiki.article.role.godfather.reminder: Chea gnhit, celset a yprela ot ackatt. Oyu haev rrmao adn entincno aura.
wiki.article.role.godfather.guide:
- Ta gnhit, celset a yprela ot ackatt
- Oyu t'nca ackatt gnhit 1
- Ohosec a pbcauk ot ackatt for oyu if oyu are cdklobe

 Oyu sohdul ryt ot ilkl wieonts hwo are lliyek ot tspo oyu ofrm nwining ro haev elfpuwor liistabie, tbu be rufceal btuao nowt vreotitecp rlsoe.
wiki.article.role.godfather.abilities:
* Siivt a yprela ot ackatt
* Ohosec onthera lvnigi nstyciade rmbeem ot be ruoy pbcauk ta nya imet
* Ihlew oyu are cdklobe, the pbcauk lwil ackatt the rsfit yprela yhte siivt
wiki.article.role.godfather.attributes:
* Ehnw oyu are cdklobe, the nstyciade si oldt htat the pbcauk tkatsca for oyu
- Hreiten oyu ro the pbcauk cna celset ro ackatt gnhit 1
wiki.article.role.godfather.extra:
* Oyu loyn haev a iscab ackatt
* Ehnw the Ergfhtaod ieds, hirte nurretc pbcauk bseoecm the Ergfhtaod
* Oyu cna not celset erhto nstyciade emberms
wiki.article.role.impostor.reminder: Chea gnhit, celset a yprela ot ackatt. If oyu dei, ruoy vearg howss ervethwa loer oyu cohes ot suidsieg as.
wiki.article.role.impostor.guide:
- Ta gnhit, celset a yprela ot ackatt
- Oyu t'nca ackatt gnhit 1
- Ohosec a pbcauk ot ackatt for oyu if oyu are cdklobe
- Oyu cna ohosec twha loer peraspa no ruoy vearg, igvnig selaf ioirfmtanon ot the nowt ehnw oyu dei

 Oyu sohdul ryt ot ilkl wieonts hwo are lliyek ot tspo oyu ofrm nwining ro haev elfpuwor liistabie, tbu be rufceal btuao nowt vreotitecp rlsoe.
wiki.article.role.impostor.abilities:
* Siivt a yprela ot ackatt
* Ohosec onthera lvnigi nstyciade rmbeem ot be ruoy pbcauk ta nya imet
* Ihlew oyu are cdklobe, the pbcauk lwil ackatt the rsfit yprela yhte siivt
- Ta nya imet ihlew oyu are iaevl, ohosec a loer, htat loer peraspa no ruoy vearg ehnw oyu dei endisat of rmostiop
wiki.article.role.impostor.attributes:
* Ehnw oyu are cdklobe, the nstyciade si oldt htat the pbcauk tkatsca for oyu
- Hreiten oyu ro the pbcauk cna celset ro ackatt gnhit 1
- Oyu haev rrmao efdnsee ta all mtsei yb efultad
wiki.article.role.impostor.extra:
* Oyu loyn haev a iscab ackatt
* Ehnw the Rmostiop ieds, hirte nurretc pbcauk bseoecm the Rmostiop
* Oyu cna not celset erhto nstyciade emberms
wiki.article.role.counterfeiter.reminder: Chea gnhit, celset a yprela ot ackatt. Oyu cna rgofe the vearg of the yprela oyu ackatt.
wiki.article.role.counterfeiter.guide:
- Chea gnhit eptexc the rsfit, ilkl a yprela
- X mtsei epr emga (X = Atotl pyasler ÷ 5 (udnro pu)), oyu cna rgofe the yprela oyu ilkl, icngahgn hirte loer adn bali in hirte vearg
wiki.article.role.counterfeiter.abilitie:
- Siivt a yprela ot iscab ackatt etmh
- If oyu cohes ot rgofe adn oyu haev sues ltfe, oyu rgofe the yprela oyu siivt, icngahgn hirte loer adn bliai in hirte vearg
wiki.article.role.counterfeiter.attribut:
- Oyu cna ocyp epast tach smsegase
- If oyu are cdklobe, it d'esont scot an yaliitb ues, tbu it eods scot a ues if the yprela oyu ackatt veusivrs
wiki.article.role.recruiter.reminder: Chea gnhit, rtieeh celset a yprela ot ackatt ro eructir. Urdctiere pyasler ijon the nstyciade tbu dei the netx gnhit. If a tcieerrur si dentereag nolrmyad, htere si noe ssel nstyciade rmbeem.
wiki.article.role.recruiter.guide:
- Oyu mya ohosec ot do noe of the ofnllgwio
    - Celset adn ackatt a yprela
    - Celset a yprela ot eructir into the nstyciade
        - Yhte are oldt yhte are urdctiere, adn htat yhte lwil wni wtih nstyciade, tbu hirte loer d'esont ehangc
        - Yhte are dkcaatet the ofnllgwio gnhit, adn vyere gnhit nitul yhte dei
        - Oyu haev 3 sues of htis yaliitb yb efultad
- For vyere imet oyu lyfuuclssecs ilkl onmseeo, oyu cna gnia noe ues ot ruoy eructir yaliitb
- If a tcieerrur si nolrmyad dentereag, a onn tcieerrur nstyciade rmbeem sha hirte loer etwsihcd ot a dnamro nowt loer obrefe the emga tastrs, yhte nevre kown of htis
wiki.article.role.recruiter.abilities:
- Oyu mya ohosec ot do noe of the ofnllgwio
    - Siivt a yprela ot ackatt etmh
    - Siivt a yprela ot eructir ot ijon the nstyciade
        - Yhte are oldt yhte are urdctiere, adn yhte onw wni wtih nstyciade, tbu hirte loer d'esont ehangc
        - Yhte lwil be lriidytcne thi wtih a ioretnog-prpcntieic ackatt vyere gnhit yb all erteircurs nitul yhte dei, if htere are on erteircurs yhte are listl dkcaatet
- For vyere imet oyu lyfuuclssecs ilkl onmseeo, oyu cna gnia noe ues ot ruoy eructir yaliitb
- If a tcieerrur si nolrmyad dentereag, a onn tcieerrur nstyciade rmbeem sha hirte loer etwsihcd ot a dnamro nowt loer obrefe the emga tastrs, yhte nevre kown of htis
wiki.article.role.recruiter.attributes:
- The nstyciade adn the rrtscieu are hoswn hwo all nstyciade adn rrtscieu are, adn hirte loer slebla
- Iunregrtci onmseeo si ackatt woepr iscab, if a yprela sha efdnsee mattetp ot eructir, iongnht spneahp
wiki.article.role.recruiter.extra:
- Oyu t'nca celset ynaobdy hwo si a eructir, ro nstyciade
- A nstyciade rmbeem t'nca be urdctiere
- A urdctiere yprela t'nca be urdctiere aangi
wiki.article.role.mafioso.reminder: Chea gnhit, celset a yprela ot ackatt.
wiki.article.role.mafioso.guide:
- Ta gnhit celset a yprela ot ackatt etmh
- Oyu t'nca ues ruoy yaliitb gnhit 1

Oyu sohdul ryt ot ilkl wieonts hwo are lliyek ot tspo oyu ofrm nwining.
wiki.article.role.mafioso.extra: * Oyu t'nca rategt erhto nstyciade emberms
wiki.article.role.santaClaus.reminder: Chea Gnhit, add pyasler ot the einc ro ngythua litss. Oyu wni ehnw loyn einc pyasler imnare iaevl.
wiki.article.role.santaClaus.guide:
- Ta the eibngginn of chea gnhit, oyu are oldt if oyu are didgna a yprela ot the ngythua tsil ro einc tsil gnhtoit, artnaetngil chea imet oyu lyfuuclssecs add a yprela ot a tsil, rgstaitn wtih einc tsil
 - Chea gnhit, ohosec a yprela ot add ot the tsil for gnhtoit
    - Ehnw a yprela si ddead ot the einc tsil, hirte nurretc wni innoctodi si deutadp ot elinucd nwining wtih the einc tsil. Htis osal pesplai ot the ngythua tsil.
* Oyu are a einc tsil olystial
* Ruoy ovtercn si an rrm-pciiongear ackatt
wiki.article.role.santaClaus.abilities:
- Ruoy ovtercn aslfi if
   - Ruoy rategt sha an ddenitnnpee wni innoctodi (lkie a ticpyal jerste)
    - Ruoy rategt si no the einc tsil.
    - Ruoy rategt si no the ngythua tsil.
    - Ruoy rategt sha a efdnsee htat cna tspo rrm-pciiongear tkatsca.
- Ruoy rategt si oldt ehnw yhte are ddead ot the einc tsil
- Ruoy rategt si oldt ehnw yhte are ddead ot the ngythua tsil
wiki.article.role.krampus.reminder: Chea gnhit, tsieieagvtn a rsalyep' loer adn wni innoctodi. Vyere odd gnhit, celset a yprela ot ackatt etmh.
wiki.article.role.krampus.guide:
- Ta gnhit celset a yprela ot tsieieagvtn etmh. Oyu alern the loer adn wni innoctodi of ruoy rategt.
- No odd histgn, oyu ackatt ruoy rategt.
wiki.article.role.krampus.attributes:
* Oyu are a ngythua tsil olystial
* Oyu haev a iscab ackatt
wiki.article.role.krampus.extra:
* Oyu cna leaev a atdeh toen. Htis si a ogod ayw ot cctiuenmoam wtih ruoy fewllo lyau-gtstinhrse.
* If Raukpsm adn Atnsa Culsa are the loyn niinremga rlsoe, yhte bhot dei adn the emga desn in a rwda.
* Vntigiis a yprela wtih ddenitnnpee wni innoctodi eods iongnht.
wiki.article.role.serialKiller.reminder: Chea gnhit, celset a yprela ot ackatt.
wiki.article.role.serialKiller.guide:
- Ta gnhit celset a yprela ot ackatt etmh
- Oyu t'nca ues ruoy yaliitb gnhit 1.
wiki.article.role.mafiaKillingWildcard.r: Ohosec a nstyciade iillkng loer ot oebmec htat loer ehnw gnhit tastrs.
wiki.article.role.mafiaKillingWildcard.g:
* Ohosec a nstyciade iillkng loer ot oebmec htat loer
    * Oyu oebmec htat loer ehnw gnhit tastrs
* Oyu lliyek t'nca oebmec a loer if onmseeo aydlrea sha htat loer (Oyu t'nca oebmec a loer htat sha eeedcxde its loer iiltm)
wiki.article.role.mafiaKillingWildcard.a: * Oebmec a loer oyu ohosec ta the asrtt of gnhit

* Oyu cna not oebmec a loer htat si aildbesd
* Oyu cna not oebmec a loer htat si eknta yb too yman pyasler
wiki.article.role.mafiaKillingWildcard.e:
* If oyu ohosec a loer htat saw aildbesd oyu ysta as the Nstyciade Iillkng Adicdlrw
* Oyu cna ohosec Nstyciade Iillkng Adicdlrw ot ysta as Nstyciade Iillkng Adicdlrw
* Oyu t'nca oebmec a loer htat si ta its loer iiltm, for mpexlea, oyu t'nca oebmec a ergfhtaod eevn if htere si aydlrea noe in the emga, eevn if htat ergfhtaod si dead
wiki.article.role.goon.reminder: On yaliitb dbseeis gibne a nstyciade isiedrn.
wiki.article.role.goon.guide: Oyu haev on gnhit imet yaliitb dbseeis ghiactnt wtih the nstyciade. Ryt ot pelh the nstyciade meoc pu wtih iles adn meoc pu wtih a fkae mlcai.
wiki.article.role.hypnotist.reminder: Chea gnhit, celset a yprela ot brllecoko adn/ro dens selaf smsegase.
wiki.article.role.hypnotist.guide:
- Ta gnhit, celset a yprela ot brllecoko ro yeontpihz
- If oyu brllecoko ruoy rategt, yhte cna not ues hirte yaliitb htat gnhit
- Oyu cna ohosec ot dens a selaf masegse ot ruoy rategt, ro ot not dens etmh the masegse gynsai yhte are eclolrkbdeo
wiki.article.role.hypnotist.abilities:
* Siivt a yprela ot brllecoko adn ohosec a masegse ot oswh etmh
    * Oyu cna dens htat yhte eerw tmtepetad ot be eclolrkbdeo
    * Oyu cna dens htat yhte eerw dkcaatet tbu adh efdnsee
    * Oyu cna dens htat yhte eerw dttocpree yb onmseeo
    * Oyu cna dens htat yhte eerw rsoantrtpde
    * Oyu cna dens htat yhte eerw tmtepetad ot be eesssdpos
    * Oyu cna dens htat yhte are krdcwadolbe
wiki.article.role.hypnotist.attributes:
* Oyu are uemnim ot oockebsrll
* Oyu mya ohosec ot not brllecoko ruoy rategt
* Oyu t'nca ohosec ot dens on smsegase
wiki.article.role.hypnotist.extra:
* Oyu t'nca celset erhto nstyciade emberms
* Ehnw oyu brllecoko onmseeo, hirte ssvtii lwil be ecdreal
wiki.article.role.consort.reminder: Chea gnhit, celset a yprela ot brllecoko.
wiki.article.role.consort.guide:
- Ta gnhit, celset a yprela ot brllecoko etmh, signtopp etmh ofrm niusg hirte yaliitb
- Ruoy rategt si oldt yhte eerw eclolrkbdeo

fOr_ pelm_axe
- A cosortn stsecle the vnieagilt, so the vnieagilt t'nca ilkl noeyan, adn bodnoy ieds
wiki.article.role.consort.abilities: * Siivt a yprela ot brllecoko etmh
wiki.article.role.consort.attributes:
* Oyu t'nca be eclolrkbdeo
* Ruoy rategt si oldt ehnw yhte are eclolrkbdeo, eevn if yhte are uemnim ot gibne eclolrkbdeo
wiki.article.role.consort.extra:
* Ehnw onmseeo si eclolrkbdeo, hirte ssvtii are dwepi, so yhte 'nodt siivt noeyan
* Oyu t'nca celset erhto nstyciade emberms
wiki.article.role.blackmailer.reminder: Chea gnhit, celset a yprela ot ilecnse, htat yprela siffteor hirte tvoe undigr the netx yad.
wiki.article.role.blackmailer.guide:
- Ta gnhit, celset a yprela ot ilecnse
- The elesdnci yprela t'nca epksa undigr the netx yad, adn yhte t'nca tvoe undigr the netx tinomanion

Oyu sohdul ohosec tvkaielta pyasler hwo might epksa uot singata a nstyciade rmbeem, ro pyasler hwo haev ioirfmtanon htat oyu tanw ot presupss.
wiki.article.role.blackmailer.abilities: * Siivt a yprela ot ilecnse etmh undigr the netx yad
wiki.article.role.blackmailer.attributes:
* Elesdnci pyasler are ocderf ot ireftof tvoe undigr the netx yad
* Elesdnci pyasler cna not tlak in tach ro uot ldou undigr the einter netx yad
wiki.article.role.blackmailer.extra:
* The elesdnci yprela si on geolnr be elesdnci ta the asrtt of the netx gnhit
* Oyu contan celset erhto nstyciade emberms
wiki.article.role.informant.reminder: Chea gnhit, celset a yprela ot alern hirte loer, hwo ssvtii etmh, adn hwo yhte tdisive. Oyu cna see all hrpeiwss.
wiki.article.role.informant.guide:
- Ta gnhit, celset a yprela ot alern:
    - Hirte loer
    - Hwo yhte tdisive
    - Hwo tdisive etmh
- Oyu cna read hrpeiwss htat eerw ntes ot erhto pyasler

Oyu sohdul cctiuenmoam the ioirfmtanon oyu gte ot the tsre of the nstyciade. It si ylarif aesy ot fkae mlcai tolukoo ro rtkcrae.
wiki.article.role.informant.abilities:
* Siivt a yprela ot
    * Alern hirte loer
    * Alern hwo tdisive etmh
    * Alern hwo yhte tdisive
* All hrpeiwss cna be read alseedrrsg of hrtheew ro not yhte eerw ntes ot oyu
wiki.article.role.informant.extra: * Oyu t'nca celset erhto nstyciade emberms
wiki.article.role.necromancer.guide: Oyu cna celset a dead yprela ot esposss adn efcor etmh ot siivt a yprela oyu celset. Oyu cna loyn ohosec ot esposss dead wieonts. Oyu cna not esposss the easm yprela meor ahtn iwtce.
wiki.article.role.necromancer.abilities:
* Siivt 2 pyasler ot make the rsfit yprela siivt the descno yprela
* The rsfit yprela oyu celset stmu paerap as a dead yprela in the ryvgdeaar
wiki.article.role.necromancer.attributes:
* The rsfit yprela oyu siivt si oldt htat yhte eerw eesssdpos ro uemnim ot eoissonpss
* Oyu are oldt all gnhit ioirfmtanon smsegase htat the yprela oyu esposss sgte oldt
* Oyu t'nca celset a dead yprela hwo oyu haev pruiyolvse eesssdpos
wiki.article.role.necromancer.extra:
* Oyu are uemnim ot ggnitet eclolrkbdeo ro eesssdpos
* Oyu cna efcor ruoy rategt ot siivt nya lvnigi yprela
* If oyu 'nodt lyfuuclssecs esposss the yprela oyu celset, oyu cna celset etmh aangi
* All ruoy ssvtii eptexc the rsfit are ecdreal trfae oyu ehangc ruoy tsartge ssvtii
    * A rtkcrae lwil loyn see oyu siivt ruoy rsfit rategt
wiki.article.role.mafiaWitch.guide:
- Ta gnhit, esposss a yprela yb cestlngie 2 pyasler
    - The rsfit yprela oyu celset lwil be ocderf ot siivt the descno yprela oyu celset

fOr_ pelm_axe
- Oyu cna spoess a vnieagilt ot ackatt onthera ieowtn yb cestlngie the vnieagilt rsfit adn the ieowtn descno
wiki.article.role.mafiaWitch.abilities: * Siivt 2 pyasler ot make the rsfit yprela siivt the descno yprela
wiki.article.role.mafiaWitch.attributes:
* The rsfit yprela oyu siivt si oldt htat yhte eerw eesssdpos ro uemnim ot eoissonpss
* Oyu are oldt all gnhit ioirfmtanon smsegase htat the yprela oyu esposss sgte oldt
wiki.article.role.mafiaWitch.extra:
* Oyu are uemnim ot ggnitet eclolrkbdeo adn eoissonpss
* Oyu t'nca celset erhto nstyciade emberms for ruoy rsfit rategt, tbu oyu cna celset nya lvnigi yprela for ruoy descno rategt
* Ruoy descno rategt sgte rdesae trfae oyu ehangc ruoy tsartge siivt, so on erhto rlsoe cna iatetncr wtih it
    * A rtkcrae lwil loyn see oyu siivt ruoy rsfit rategt
wiki.article.role.mortician.reminder: Chea gnhit, celset a yprela ot atg etmh for gcbnisour. If yhte dei, hirte loer adn bliai are iedndh.
wiki.article.role.mortician.guide:
- Ta gnhit, celset a yprela ot atg etmh for gcbnisour
    - A yprela hwo si eagdgt for gcbnisour sgte orbucdes ehnw yhte dei, nrageis hirte loer adn bliai ofrm hirte vearg so bodnoy oskwn hwo yhte are
    - Oyu are oldt the orbucdes pyasler loer adn bliai ehnw yhte dei
- Oyu cna atg as yman pyasler as oyu tanw, tbu oyu cna loyn rbuoesc X pyasler (X = Atotl pyasler ÷ 5 (udnro pu))
wiki.article.role.mortician.abilities:
* Siivt a yprela ot atg etmh for gcbnisour
* If a yprela si orbucdes, htat rsalyep' loer adn bliai do not paerap in the ryvgdeaar
* Oyu are oldt the loer adn bliai of the yprela oyu orbucdes ehnw yhte dei.
wiki.article.role.mortician.attributes:
* Oyu cna loyn reve rbuoesc X pyasler epr emga (X = Atotl pyasler ÷ 5 (udnro pu))
* Oyu t'nca celset a yprela hwo si aydlrea eagdgt
* Oyu cna rategt erhto nstyciade emberms
wiki.article.role.mortician.extra:
* Oyu cna rategt erhto nstyciade emberms, tbu not furseoyl
* Ruoy yaliitb d'esont rokw trfae oyu are dead
- Oyu t'nca celset a yprela hwo si aydlrea eagdgt
wiki.article.role.forger.reminder: Ta gnhit, celset a yprela, if yhte dei, hirte loer adn bliai no hirte vearg si regfdo.
wiki.article.role.forger.guide:
- Ta gnhit, celset a yprela hwo ieds ot rgofe hirte loer adn bliai
- Gniogrf a yprela no the gnhit yhte dei lsoalw oyu ot dtie hirte loer adn bliai in hirte vearg
- Oyu cna ues ruoy yaliitb X mtsei (X = Atotl pyasler ÷ 5 (udnro pu))

Oyu sohdul celset the easm yprela as the ergfhtaod ro nstyciade iillkng so ruoy yaliitb llaacuyt kowrs.
wiki.article.role.forger.abilities:
* Siivt a yprela ot rgofe hirte vearg loyn if yhte dei gnhtoit
* If a vearg si regfdo, htat rsalyep' loer adn bliai paerap ot be twha oyu ohosec
* Oyu are oldt the giinralo loer adn bliai of the yprela oyu rgofe
wiki.article.role.forger.attributes:
* Oyu loyn haev X sues of ruoy yaliitb (X = Atotl pyasler ÷ 5 (udnro pu))
- Oyu cna ocyp epast tach smsegase
wiki.article.role.forger.extra:
* If oyu siivt a yprela ot mattetp ot rgofe etmh, it stsoc an yaliitb ues, eevn if yhte 'nodt dei
* If oyu are cdklobe, it d'esont scot an yaliitb ues
* Oyu t'nca rategt erhto nstyciade emberms
wiki.article.role.framer.reminder: Chea gnhit, celset a yprela ot eivg ssiusucipo aura. If oyu celset 2 pyasler, the rsfit yprela peraspa ot siivt the descno yprela.
wiki.article.role.framer.guide:
- Ta gnhit, celset a yprela ot aemrf
    - Mdfrae pyasler haev ssiusucipo aura
    - A yprela esslo the mdfrae ttauss trfae gibne tdisive yb nya nowt tvangieievtsi loer
- If oyu celset 2 pyasler
    - The rsfit si mdfrae
    - The rsfit yprela peraspa ot siivt the descno yprela for htat gnhit
    - Ruoy descno siivt si redvmoe

wiki.article.role.framer.abilities:
* Siivt a yprela ot aemrf
    - Mdfrae pyasler haev ssiusucipo aura
    - A yprela tspos gibne mdfrae ehnw a nowt tvangieievtsi loer ssvtii etmh

  * Aemrf the rsfit yprela
  * The rsfit pyasler paerap ot siivt the descno yprela oyu siivt
 - Ruoy descno siivt si redvmoe
wiki.article.role.framer.attributes:

- Oyu cna celset noeyan for the descno siivt, eevn dead pyasler ro furseoyl

    - A rtkcrae loyn sese oyu siivt ruoy rsfit rategt
    - The akanmrms ntwo see oyu siivt the descno rategt
    - Oyu 'nodt dei if ruoy descno rategt si an ntearev hwo si rgagpinam
wiki.article.role.disguiser.reminder: Ta gnhit, ohosec an isiedrn ot suidsieg nitul the netx gnhit, igvnig etmh entincno aura, adn mkagin hirte vearg oswh the norwg loer.
wiki.article.role.disguiser.guide:
- Ta gnhit, celset a yprela ot suidsieg
    - The yprela oyu siivt bseoecm ruoy iiddgusse rategt nitul the asrtt of netx gnhit, ro yhte dei, ro oyu dei
    - The iiddgusse yprela sha an entincno aura
    - The iiddgusse yprela sha hirte loer paerap ot be twha oyu cohes no hirte vearg
    - Oyu cna suidsieg nya yprela in ruoy isiedrn rpogu, ungclndii furseoyl
wiki.article.role.disguiser.abilities:

wiki.article.role.reeducator.reminder: Ta gnhit, ohosec a fewllo isiedrn ot oebmec a nstyciade toprspu loer htat oyu ohosec. Ceno epr emga, ovtercn a yprela ot ijon the nstyciade.
wiki.article.role.reeducator.guide:
- Ta gnhit, rtieeh celset a yprela adn nstyciade toprspu loer
    - If oyu celset a nstyciade isiedrn
        - Hirte loer etchiwss ot the loer oyu ohosec
    - If oyu celset onmseeo hwo tnsi' a nstyciade isiedrn
        - Hirte loer etchiwss ot the loer oyu ohosec
        - Yhte oebmec a nstyciade isiedrn
        - Yhte oebmec a nstyciade olystial
        - Oyu cna loyn ovtercn ydbeomso ceno, if oyu siivt a onn nstyciade isiedrn aangi, ruoy yaliitb eods iongnht
- No gnhit 1, oyu cna loyn celset fewllo siesindr
- If the uecortadre si nolrmyad dentereag, a onn uecortadre nstyciade isiedrn sha hirte loer etwsihcd ot a dnamro nowt loer obrefe the emga tastrs, yhte nevre kown of htis
